Articles.Content:
Download the Outernet and play multiplayer.

How do I land on Tylo?

use a lander that can land on the surface of kerbin without parachutes

How does one build a rocket powered model train?

Stick a couple of sugar rockets to it's side.

How do I orbit the Mun without engines or RCS?

Use your EVA Jetpack once you get into High Kerbin Orbit.

How do I land on Eve and return?

It's Eve. You don't.

How do I get to Eeloo with less than 2000dV

With difficulty.

How would you successfully divide by 0?

With this: /

How would you blow the TARDIS

Breathe on it.

Why?

because.

How could a potato run KSP? (Mine does!)

Only if you make it into chips first.

How would you think of anything to ask here?

you think, you type, done

how would you make KSP load faster with mods

don't use them.

Is this a good question?

no it is not

how to type pictures

with my eyes closed.

how would you get unacddicted to KSP? not that anyone would want to...

By pouring water on whatever HDD/SSD it's stored on.

How would you post on the forums?

somewhat like this...i think....

how would you forget this question?

With a Neuralizer.

*Flash*

With a Neuralizer.

*Flash*

With a Neuralizer.

Anyway, how would you get to school/work if you had unlimited money?

With a small VTOL jet. by small i mean like 13x14 ish.

What would you do about all the people getting fried under your VTOl exhaust?

i would sell there bodies to a cannibal cult and have a barbecue

how would you play KSP in space?

by installing it on your rocket's computer.

How would you defend yourself against a maniac armed with a banana (or other fresh fruit)?

i grab a mannequin arm and say i'm armed

ow would you survive without KSP for a year
By sitting quitely in the corner, rocking back and forth, muttering either More boosters... or Space... Space... Space... over and over again.

By making up my own answer.

How would you take over the world armed only with a bunch of raspberries?

Simply release the tiger. (wait that's if you are attacked with raspberries, hmmm)

How would you blow up the Earth?

By buying an inflatable globe. I'm friggin hilarious.

How would you commit the perfect murder?
